name: StellarPriceBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This briefing will keep you up-to-date on the current price of the Stellar (XLM) crypto-currency. Details such as price, market cap, and increase percentage (24hr and 7day) will be read aloud.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
